name: Watch Dogs
notes:
+ After the installer finished please download the game via UPlay
+ I recommend to disable the in game UPlay Overlay it might crash the game
+ To get the sound working you need to open up the Wine Configuration, In the application tab pick "Add Application" .. then go into Program Files (x64)/Ubisoft/Ubisoft Game Launcher/games/Watch_Dogs/bin/Watch_Dogs.exe then click on "Watch_Dogs.exe" and choose it's OS as Windows XP
content:
files:
- uplay: https://ubistatic3-a.akamaihd.net/orbit/launcher_installer/UplayInstaller.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Ubisoft/Ubisoft Game Launcher/Uplay.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /S
    executable: uplay
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
